languages.text: "Для тебя он и правда один — посмотреть, держа руки на виду, и почтительно отойти от священной десятины".

traits.locale_text: "Для тебя он и правда один — посмотреть, держа руки на виду, и почтительно отойти от священной десятины".

languages.text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."
languages.original_text: "Для тебя он и правда один — посмотреть, держа руки на виду, и почтительно отойти от священной десятины".

traits.locale_text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."
"For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."
"For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."
"For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."
"For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."
"For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."

languages.text: 「お前に許された行動はひとつだけだ。両手を見える位置に出し、聖なる租税には近づかず、黙って見ていろ」
languages.original_text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."

traits.locale_text: 「お前に許された行動はひとつだけだ。両手を見える位置に出し、聖なる租税には近づかず、黙って見ていろ」

languages.text: "Für Euch gibt es nur einen Weg, ja. Durch Blicke, während Ihr in gebührendem Abstand vom heiligen Zehnt steht und beide Hände da haltet, wo ich sie sehen kann."
languages.original_text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Für Euch gibt es nur einen Weg, ja. Durch Blicke, während Ihr in gebührendem Abstand vom heiligen Zehnt steht und beide Hände da haltet, wo ich sie sehen kann."

languages.text: « Pour vous, effectivement : en vous contentant de regarder, les mains bien en évidence, tout en restant à une distance respectueuse de la dîme sacrée. »
languages.original_text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."

traits.locale_text: « Pour vous, effectivement : en vous contentant de regarder, les mains bien en évidence, tout en restant à une distance respectueuse de la dîme sacrée. »

languages.text: «Desde luego usted solo tiene un modo: mirando, con las manos donde yo pueda verlas y guardando una respetuosa distancia con el sagrado diezmo».
languages.original_text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego usted solo tiene un modo: mirando, con las manos donde yo pueda verlas y guardando una respetuosa distancia con el sagrado diezmo».

languages.text: “对你来说，该做的确实只有一件事情，那就是——把你的双手放在我能看见的地方，离那些神圣的什一税远点。”
languages.original_text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."

traits.locale_text: “对你来说，该做的确实只有一件事情，那就是——把你的双手放在我能看见的地方，离那些神圣的什一税远点。”

languages.text: "Tabii... Sana müstahak tek yol, kutsal aşardan olabildiğince uzak durup o ellerini de kendine saklamak."
languages.original_text: "For you, there is only one way indeed — by looking, with both your hands where I can see them, while standing at a respectful distance from the sacred tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii... Sana müstahak tek yol, kutsal aşardan olabildiğince uzak durup o ellerini de kendine saklamak."
